> your application just got disqualified (and can not be accepted anymore)

I just want to know that there is the existence of the Assembly in VN or not?

Yes of course, and then...

> [yo](#comment_11_1GtJqyJRsuZhmxVtw5USgvqGbUmVH7EmBD): oh u dint get that? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_Hot_Catholic_Love

ohm, thanks
